songs.title: Desi
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Assa wadeyan shikariyan da rab rakhwala
Gali gali ch ve bohemia da bol bala
Ve munde punjabi rapper daa na pachande
Ve kudiya ne vekh mainu maarnee chaalan
Main aadmi anokha …andaaz ve niraala
Jithe gaddi nu roka, utthe kudiya da jaala
Sada sacheya de naal lava sachi dilo yaari
Jehda dil dy jhoothe, ohna da mooh kala
Naale din raat, peeva mein bhang kara main show
Mere to tang rave mera peo, na jaane kyo?
Na jaane kyo rooz peeva mein bhangg
Meri bhedi aadatan ton mere ghar wale tang
Mera dil nam, menu mile ehsas
Dil wich mere sada sukhi waqhta di aas
Ik din aayega zaroor khushiyan da jehde
Langh gaaye yaar mainu utto di dende awaz…..

(Chorus)
PARDESI, par fir bhi dil sada DESI
Asi DESAN ch, jame si PARDESAN ch abbad…
Asi PARDESI, par fir bhi dil sada DESI
Asi DESAN ch, jame si PARDESAN ch abbad…

[Verse 2]
Meri kaaleya te goreyan de naal ve yaari
Desi putt jawaan main va vada shikari
Tusi aadmi ho, kamchor!, asi aadmi kuch hor
Evi firdi ni vehle, asi bande karobari
Ik yaar mera jatt, chalanda mac cut
Ohnu doleyan te mann, jive hunda pehlwan
Loki vekhan ohdi shaan, hunde pareshaan
Raaj kare pardes ch, punjabi munda jawaan
Dooja yaar patel, munda gujarati
Motoran da karobaar, har cheez duniya di
Mainu aakhe kem cho, meh kehva maje ma
Sache yaar ik dooje di karde ve seva
Ik yaar mera hindu, dooja yaar musalmaan
Mera ik yaar isai, na deen na imaan
Mera’ mil jul rehan je saare desi parde wich
Aish karange gore aadmi de desh wich…Asi

(Chorus)
PARDESI, par fir bhi dil sada DESI
Asi DESAN ch, jame si PARDESAN ch abbad…
Asi PARDESI, par fir bhi dil sada DESI
Asi DESAN ch, jame si PARDESAN ch abbad…

[Verse 3]
Yaar bathere par saare mere nall ni chalde …
Munde jame kal de…mere kolo jalde
Mai jithe javaan, mere picho o gallan karde..
Saamne ni khade mere kolo darde
Mainu rabb di saun v jehda khange murhe mere aake mainu
Vekhle meri akkhan cha akkhan mila k meri
Rag rag ch vase lahu mere des da
Mai han desi putt jawaan munda pardes da
Mai kara elaan, police pareshaan
Uhna ton vekhi na jaaye desi munde di shaan
Hun lattan mein khalara, police nu meinsala
Main vaan desi zor di naare mai maara
Ve naal naal mere desi mundeyan di tehni
Aapa aapdi gaalan kise hor nu ni kehni
Vairyan di esi di tesi
Mai dudh peeta ma da baneya va desi pardes wich vase…Asi

(Chorus)
PARDESI, par fir bhi dil sada DESI
Asi DESAN ch, jame si PARDESAN ch abbad…
Asi PARDESI, par fir bhi dil sada DESI
Asi DESAN ch, jame si PARDESAN ch abbad……..X3
